channel.title: [Aggroth V3] Looking Awesome - Pi - 317 - Epic content!
channel.description:
[size=14pt]Aggroth V3 is now online![/size]
[url=http://aggroth.com/]Website[/url] [url=http://aggroth.com/webclient.php]Play Now - Webclient[/url] [url=http://aggroth.com/client.jar]Play Now - Download client[/url] [url=http://aggroth.com/playselect.php]Play Select[/url] [url=http://aggroth.com/]Vote[/url] [url=http://aggroth.com/highscores]HighScores[/url]
Features: 14 perfect player ranks: [spoiler=Click here to see what ranks![/spoiler] -Player -Bronze Donator -Iron Donator -Adamant Donator -Rune Donator -Dragon Donator -Dicer -Veteran -Helper -Test Moderator -Moderator -Administrator -Co Owner -Owner -Developer[/spoiler] -26 Perfect loyalty titles [spoiler=Click here to see what ranks!] -Scout -Corporal -Kolonel -General -Skiller -Lord -Lady -King -Queen -God -Godess -The Fallen ==============Staff Ranks============ -Bronze Donator -Iron Donator -Adamant Donator -Rune Donator -Dragon Donator -Dicer -Veteran -Helper -Test Moderator -Moderator -Administrator -Co Owner -Owner -Developer[/spoiler] -100% Player shops - All dupes fixed - Works like a charm -100% Vote4Cash -100% Auto Donations -100% Highscores -Reconstructed NPC drops -Rewritten Duel-Arena -Flawless bossing -Vote Points store, Donator Points store -Flawless level-points system, you get 5 points everytime you level up -100% 562 dialogues, fixed the cracks in faces! -Shops out of dialogues, select a shop and it will open -Dicer rank is the only rank that can dice -Fixed clan chats! -Drygores, and even offhand drygores! -Sagittarian -Torva, pernix, virtus -Primal, chaotic -Flawless banking -Epic combat, all rates have been checked and fixed -New 508-525 maps by Tokashi
Pictures [img]http://i.gyazo.com/4045f1e3b56dbdfef0282dcfbacec672.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/924e86fde2abd4d03c80712e36522b56.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/8d76d9c15ce6abd94d8fc1139925e30f.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/5d0f1b150a31a2f7eb5a0d0beacf790b.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/5e22ad1f1df9ca55d5219a4e7c38d533.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/a99874bc71ff451260d332cfcfd153ce.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/544bc0c66b966290d23711d06daa301a.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/544bc0c66b966290d23711d06daa301a.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/7209c33b26c0d6edf81113d31aff6c58.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/4ed6e99b8e87e63ee86d8a09755e3899.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/7909a16203eb79bbc08f80425fe41734.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/95af79ea1e02848e6b1fa181792dd29f.gif[/img]
And the loyalty titles fix: [img]http://i.gyazo.com/f11706a00791263adbba2556183ab788.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/c8994ee8d18831240de915d74cfd9c4a.gif[/img]
And a nex bossing vid which went horrible wrong >.> [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=1YBpk1OxAss]Click here to view it![/url]
Hope you enjoy!

item.title: [Aggroth V3] Looking Awesome - Pi - 317 - Epic content!
item.dc:creator: @Shaloxis Shaloxis
item.description:
@Shaloxis wrote:

[size=14pt]Aggroth V3 is now online![/size]

Website
Play Now - Webclient
Play Now - Download client
Play Select
Vote
HighScores

Features:
14 perfect player ranks:
[spoiler=Click here to see what ranks![/spoiler]
-Player
-Bronze Donator
-Iron Donator
-Adamant Donator
-Rune Donator
-Dragon Donator
-Dicer
-Veteran
-Helper
-Test Moderator
-Moderator
-Administrator
-Co Owner
-Owner
-Developer[/spoiler]
-26 Perfect loyalty titles
[spoiler=Click here to see what ranks!]
-Scout
-Corporal
-Kolonel
-General
-Skiller
-Lord
-Lady
-King
-Queen
-God
-Godess
-The Fallen
==============Staff Ranks============
-Bronze Donator
-Iron Donator
-Adamant Donator
-Rune Donator
-Dragon Donator
-Dicer
-Veteran
-Helper
-Test Moderator
-Moderator
-Administrator
-Co Owner
-Owner
-Developer[/spoiler]
-100% Player shops - All dupes fixed - Works like a charm
-100% Vote4Cash
-100% Auto Donations
-100% Highscores
-Reconstructed NPC drops
-Rewritten Duel-Arena
-Flawless bossing
-Vote Points store, Donator Points store
-Flawless level-points system, you get 5 points everytime you level up
-100% 562 dialogues, fixed the cracks in faces!
-Shops out of dialogues, select a shop and it will open
-Dicer rank is the only rank that can dice
-Fixed clan chats!
-Drygores, and even offhand drygores!
-Sagittarian
-Torva, pernix, virtus
-Primal, chaotic
-Flawless banking
-Epic combat, all rates have been checked and fixed
-New 508-525 maps by Tokashi

Pictures











And the loyalty titles fix:

And a nex bossing vid which went horrible wrong >.>
Click here to view it!

Hope you enjoy!
